shorts.content: A new ad campaign is targeting a vulnerable first-term Republican congressman in a Northeastern Pennsylvania swing district after he broke his promise not to vote for Medicaid cuts.Rep. Rob Bresnahan Jr. (R-Pa.) joined the rest of his party last week to vote …

shorts.title: MLB: Mets’ Kranick expected to undergo season-ending surgery
shorts.title_distilled: MLB: Mets’ Kranick expected to undergo season-ending surgery.
shorts.description: NEW YORK — Mets reliever and Scranton native Max Kranick is expected to have season-ending surgery on his right elbow, the latest blow to New York’s injury-depleted bullpen. Kranick was placed on the 15-day injured list June 19 with an elbow strain. He had Tommy John surgery in June 2022 and is facing a second major operation on his pitching arm in 37 months. “He’s going to have a Tommy John,” manager Carlos Mendoza said Friday before his team’s 8-4 loss to the Cincinnati Reds. “I don’t think we have a date yet, but he’s going to have the surgery.” New York’s […]

Kranick was placed on the 15-day injured list June 19 with an elbow strain.
